com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.extraction.documents.block

Interface Block<PositionInDocument>

  • Type Parameters:
    PositionInDocument - The type of the position in original document. In XML-documents this may be the XML-node. In plain text documents this may be the offset of the string begin.

    public interface Block<PositionInDocument>
    The Block is used to specify a chunk of text called: Block. A Block could have context information, and segmentation settings, like excluding or different BreakLevel. Also a Block could be easily mapped to a position in the original document.
